org.ambraproject.rhino.view.article

Class ArticleOutputView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.view.article.ArticleOutputView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArticleView, JsonOutputView

    public class ArticleOutputView
extends Object
implements JsonOutputView, ArticleView
    A view of an article for printing to JSON. When serialized to a JSON object, it should contain all the same fields as a default dump of the article, plus a few added or augmented.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.ambraproject.rhino.view.JsonOutputView
